price: Zalaalam ishee keessa jiraatu, jaalallees ta’ee gargaaraa (isaan baraaru) hin argatan.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۖ لَّا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā abadan lā yajidūna waliyyan walā naṣīran
